thread.section_title: MmoGah 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 MmoGah 的点评意见 | mmogah.com
thread.title: Steven Hinton
thread.title_full: MmoGah 的点评人 Steven Hinton

author: Steven Hinton
title: Steven Hinton
text: I used to use another service, but they constantly told me one thing and did another. Said they had stock, but didn't and forced me to wait and would not give me a refund. Since switching to MMOGah, it's been flawless. Excellent and quick service and more importantly, RELIABLE. Will only purchase from them since they are quick and efficient!
